info.name: HTTP Missing Security Headers
author: socketz
geeknik
g4l1t0
convisoappsec
kurohost
dawid-czarnecki
info.description: It searches for missing security headers, but obviously, could be so less generic and could be useless for Bug Bounty.

curl-command: curl -X 'GET' -d '' -H 'Accept: */*' -H 'Accept-Language: en' -H 'User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/89.0.4389.114 Safari/537.36' 'https://example.com'

info.name: DNSSEC Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: A template to check if Delegation of Signing (DS) record provides information about a signed zone file when DNSSEC enabled.
